description: License-Token introduces a transformative model for sustainable open-source software by merging financial systems and traditional licensing, offering new solutions for funding, contributions, and governance within OSS communities.
keywords: License-Token, open-source software, OSS sustainability, financial system, digital asset model, sustainable funding, blockchain technologies, open-source licensing, community-driven software, software governance
title: License-Token: A New Paradigm for OSS Sustainability
